int main (void)
 Turn notes on and off, verify that the expected number of notes are sounding at given times.

Detailed Description

Test mutual exclusion of pitches on a channel.

Author:
Phil Burk, Copyright 2002 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL

Define Documentation

#define CHANNEL   (2)

#define PROGRAM_ORGAN   (17)

#define SAMPLE_RATE   (44100)

#define TEST_PITCH ( pitch,
expected   ) 

Value:

SPMUtil_NoteOn( spmidiContext, CHANNEL, (pitch), 64 ); \
    KillTime( spmidiContext, 1 ); /* Let stifled notes die off. */ \
    VerifyChannelNotes( spmidiContext, CHANNEL, (expected) );

expected   ) 

Value:

SPMUtil_NoteOn( spmidiContext, CHANNEL, (pitch), 64 ); \
    VerifyChannelNotes( spmidiContext, CHANNEL, (expected) );

int main ( void   ) 

Turn notes on and off, verify that the expected number of notes are sounding at given times.
